Title: Relates to the definition of administration with respect to immunization to prevent COVID-19 for children between the ages of two and eighteen years of age
Summary: Relates to the definition of administration with respect to immunization to prevent COVID-19 for children between the ages of two and eighteen years of age.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the definition of "administration" with respect to immunization to prevent COVID-19 for children between the ages of two and eighteen years of age
